name: Tim Hodges
text: Pretty good pizza. Can't beat the prices

name: June Kerns
text: God fathers has the best pizza  that I have eaten in Ky they really know what goes in a good pizza they also have wonderful sandwiches

name: Tim Fowler
text: Good fresh pizza made on the spot

name: Mindy Baker
text: Their pizza is my favorite in the area

name: kent puckett
text: Nice people. Clean store. Good food.

name: Brandon Evers
text: Because if you order over the phone and tell them to put so many biscuts and meat/egg/sausage/bacon aside and you ask how much is to add egg and cheese they tell you it dont cost anything but then they charge you for it. Not happy with that at all.

name: Ben Crabtree
text: Love the godfathers pizzas. They usually have a special ask when you call.

name: Brian C
text: Little lighter on the toppings some recently and the food up front kept warm for quick purchase could be kept an eye on slightly better but its a great addition to the community with a great location that helps out the community with the local plants workers.

name: Grim Fortune
text: ITS IGHT G BUT IT AINT NO DAMN DOMINOES
